CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 13, 1945, pg. 26 reads: "Sponsors Of Games Party At Kay Club - Thursday, Oct. 18, Unit 6 of the Association of Kay Women's Auxiliaries will sponsor their mammoth games party at the Kay Boys' Club. Attractive prizes are being offered and the participants will have a choice of games.  Mrs. Georgia Price is president of the unit.  Left to right, seated: Mesdames Leola Graham, Mrs. Georgia Price, Mrs. Fleda McGuin and Mrs. Margaret Anthony.  Standing, left to right: Mrs. Marie Hays, Mrs. Helen Richardson, Mrs. Lillian Gentry, Mrs. Ruth Bland and Mrs. Mary Austin.   The proceeds of the party will be used to purchase two new settees for the Women's Lounge.  W.P. Young will supervise the playing. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of the Unit 6 of the Association of Kay Women's Auxiliaries, from left, seated: Leola Graham, Georgia Price, Fleda McGuin, and Margaret Anthony;  standing: Marie Hays, Helen Richardson, Lillian Gentry, Ruth Bland, and Mary Austin, posed in Kay Boy's Club, another version
